description: A surprising punchline about talking muffins
title: Talking Muffins
n_1: Two muffins are sitting in an oven, baking quietly.
c1_1: Man, it’s really hot in here.
n_2: The first muffin looks calm while the second is shocked.
c1_2: I was just thinking the same thing.
n_3: The second muffin is in disbelief.
n_4: Both muffins share a moment of realization.
c1_4: We need to tell the others.
